shortDescription: The Paytium: Mollie payment forms & donations plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized notification dismissal due to a missing capability check on the paytium_notice_dismiss function in versions up to, and including, 4.3.7. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with subscriber-level access to dismiss admin notices.
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
